Question: This person is a fourteenth-generation New Yorker, and was listed in the Social Register at an early age.
Hints: In September 1993, this person hosted The ____ Show, a weeknight talk show, for the Fox Broadcasting Company.
In 2005, this person was the keynote speaker at Princeton University's Class Day, part of commencement activities.
The nickname Chevy was bestowed by his grandmother, derived from the medieval English The Ballad of this person.
